articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
As the government works to create a more ordered legal environment for crypto assets, Turkey is seeing an increase in applications for digital currency licenses.
 
 
This trend, which is fueled by a combination of legal clarity and economic considerations, shows how eager cryptocurrency companies are to operate in the country.
 
The continuous devaluation of the Turkish lira and high inflation rates have driven many people to look for other investment possibilities, hence increasing the demand for cryptocurrencies.
 
Crypto: Development In Regulations
 
Currently under final considerations, the Turkish government calls on virtual asset service providers (VASPs) to secure permits from the Capital Markets Board (CMB). This program aims to improve investor security and provide a safe space fo…
articles.title: Crypto Craze In Turkey: License Requests Soar Amid Regulatory Changes

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description: Polymarket, a cryptocurrency-based prediction market, has declared Edmundo Gonzalez, the opposition candidate, the winner of the Venezuelan presidential election bet. The decision, made days after the election, ignores the official results announced by the National Electoral Council (CNE), which proclaimed Maduro as president amidst fraud allegations from opposition leaders. This prompted several users to question […]
articles.title: Polymarket’s Integrity Questioned Over Venezuelan Presidential Election Bet Outcome

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer Paul Grewal has raised concerns on social media regarding the Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s (CFTC) proposed rule to ban certain event contracts. Coinbase has also formally responded to the proposal, urging the CFTC to reconsider its stance, which the company argues could stifle innovation in the prediction markets. Coinbase Urges CFTC […]
articles.title: Coinbase Challenges CFTC Proposal, Advocates for Balanced Regulation of Event Contracts

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
The Shibarium network, a layer-2 solution built on the Shiba Inu blockchain, introduced an automated burn mechanism today. The update will be effective as of block 6,206,570 and was first announced by Lucie, the marketing lead of Shiba Inu, via X: “Starting at block 6206570, the Shibarium network will roll out a long-awaited update: a burn mechanism directly tied to transaction fees.”
 
Shibarium Will Finally Burn Shiba Inu Token Automated
 
According to Lucie’s announcement, the new feature will automatically convert 70% of all base transaction fees collected by the network into SHIB tokens which will then be permanently removed from circulation. “With this update, 70% of all base transaction fees collected on the network will be automatically converted to SHIB tokens and permanently remo…
articles.title: Automated Shiba Inu Burns Kick Off On Shibarium Today

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, staying ahead often means finding the next big opportunity before it hits the mainstream. Recently, Pepe Unchained (PEPU) has been making waves in the crypto community, particularly for its innovative integration of Layer-2 technology that has significantly raised the bar for meme coins. As Pepe Unchained (PEPU) continues to attract attention and investment, a new contender is rapidly emerging on the scene: Mpeppe (MPEPE), a gambling-focused memecoin that’s generating considerable buzz among seasoned investors.
 
Pepe Unchained (PEPU): A Game-Changer in the Meme Coin Space 
Pepe Unchained (PEPU) has quickly distinguished itself from the crowded field of meme coins, not just because of its playful branding but due to its technological edge. Built o…
articles.title: PEPU or MPEPE: Pepecoin Investors Add MPEPE Gambling For 1000X Profits

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the Shiba Inu (SHIB) community looks forward to a potential 30% price uplift by September, driven by the latest upgrades to the Shibarium Layer-2 network, another rising star in the crypto space, Mpeppe (MPEPE), is capturing attention with its aggressive progress through its presale stages.
 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Its Anticipated Surge 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) has recently been in the spotlight due to significant developments within its ecosystem. The introduction of a new hard fork and a burn mechanism within the Shibarium Layer-2 network is expected to reduce the supply of SHIB tokens, potentially driving up their price. The Shibarium network, which has already processed over 417 million transactions across 1.8 million wallets, is set to further improve its transaction speed and stability wit…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Holders Beg For A 30% Uplift By September, Whilst Mpeppe Storms Through Their Stages

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Ethereum (ETH) whales are making headlines by directing their substantial investments toward Mpeppe (MPEPE), a new token on the Ethereum blockchain that is rapidly gaining traction. Priced at $0.00107, Mpeppe is not only attracting attention but is also poised for significant gains. Here’s why Ethereum (ETH) whales are increasingly bullish on Mpeppe (MPEPE) and how it could potentially offer 100X returns.
 
Ethereum Whales: The Movers and Shakers of the Crypto World 
Ethereum (ETH) whales are influential players in the crypto market, known for their ability to sway trends and drive substantial market movements. Their investment choices often signal emerging opportunities and can impact the direction of various cryptocurrencies. Recently, these whales have shown a keen interest in Mpeppe (M…
articles.title: Ethereum Whale Pumps Their With Mpeppe Tokens Positioned to 100X

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Finding the next big opportunity can be both exhilarating and daunting. Among the plethora of digital assets, Solana (SOL) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are emerging as standout contenders for significant growth. Here’s a closer look at why these two altcoins are capturing attention and how they are positioned to deliver substantial returns.
 
Solana (SOL): A Blockchain Powerhouse 
Solana (SOL) has emerged as a major player in the blockchain space due to its high-speed transactions and scalability. Its unique consensus mechanism, known as Proof of History (PoH), allows for incredibly fast transaction speeds, processing thousands of transactions per second. This efficiency enhances the user experience and makes Solana (SOL) an attractive platform for decentralized applications (dApps) and financial se…
articles.title: Solana (SOL) and Mpeppe Two Altcoins That Will Give Investors 100x Profits

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the high-stakes world of cryptocurrency investing, timing is everything. As the market gears up for the next big bull run, influential figures in the crypto space are making strategic moves to position themselves for maximum gains. One such move making waves is the investment by a prominent crypto tycoon in Pepecoin (PEPE) and the emerging cryptocurrency Mpeppe (MPEPE). Here’s why these two assets are capturing the attention of seasoned investors and how they might shape the next phase of the crypto market.
 
The Strategic Move: Investing in Pepecoin (PEPE) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) 
Pepecoin (PEPE) has long been a staple in the meme coin sector, gaining fame for its unique blend of internet culture and cryptocurrency. Its success has paved the way for similar assets, and Mpeppe (MPEPE) is eme…
articles.title: Crypto Tycoon Invest In Pepecoin (PEPE) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) Before The Next Bull Run Comes Around

articles.author: Godspower Owie
articles.description:
Since the recent ruling in the US SEC’s battle against XRP on Wednesday, there has been a spike in optimism and interest in the altcoin’s prospects. Despite the long-standing tussle, which impacted the price of XRP significantly in 2020, several crypto analysts like Doctor Profit still believe in the coin’s potential in the long term.
 
XRP Short-Term Investment Is A Wrong Game
 
In a bullish statement, Doctor Profit, a popular crypto expert and trader, has recently referred to XRP as a masterpiece for investments in the long term, stressing its distinct robustness in the volatile world of cryptocurrencies. 
 
 
Amid rising interest in digital assets, Doctor Profit underlines the altcoin’s endurance in the face of mounting pressures from regulatory challenges and investors’ uncertainty. Wh…
articles.title: XRP Deemed A Masterpiece For Long-Term Investment By Crypto Analyst, Here’s Why

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: In a recent interview with Kitco News, Mike McGlone, Senior Commodity Strategist at Bloomberg Intelligence, warned that the current economic situation might surpass the 2008 financial crisis in severity. Drawing comparisons to pre-2008 indicators, McGlone highlighted significant risks of increased stock market volatility and global recession, particularly emphasizing economic challenges in China. He suggested that […]
articles.title: Bloomberg’s Mike McGlone: Recession Fears Could Drive Gold to $3,000

articles.author: Ethan  Luc
articles.description: The prevailing “low float, high FDV” model can generate significant initial interest in project but benefits tend to disintegrate in the long-term, says Lava Network's Ethan Luc.
articles.title: Crypto Needs to Radically Rethink Token Distribution

articles.description: It’s long past time for critics to look past their biases and recognize the reality of the digital assets industry, say Sheila Warren and Justin Slaughter.
articles.title: What the NYT and Washington Post Op-Eds Get Wrong About Crypto

articles.description: The company said it will use both Ripple USD (RLUSD) and XRP for cross-border payments services.
articles.title: Ripple Begins Testing Its Stablecoin on Ethereum and XRP Ledger

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Not many in the industry anticipated the Bitcoin crash last week or how far it will eventually go. However, crypto analyst Ali Martinez is one of the analysts who expected another crash, and had seemingly managed to predict where the price would eventually bottom. Following his correct prediction, Martinez has now revealed where he expects the BTC price to be headed next.
 
Calling The $54,500 Bottom
 
Following the crash that rocked the market, sending the Bitcoin price below $50,000, the cryptocurrency had begun another recovery. This recovery saw a break above $57,000, prompting many in the space to forecast a continuation of the bull rally.
 
 
However, at the time, crypto analyst Ali Martinez revealed that the Bitcoin chart was showing a classic rising wedge pattern. This was ultimate…
articles.title: Analyst Who Predicted Bitcoin Crash To $54,500 Reveals Where Price Is Headed Next

articles.author: Media
articles.description: PRESS RELEASE. New York, August 9th, 2024 – Nexio, a pioneering Bitcoin scaling solution leveraging parallelized rollup technology, today announced that it has raised $2.2 million in pre-seed funding from a diverse roster of prominent industry investors. This funding will enable Nexio to accelerate the development and adoption of its parallelized Bitcoin rollup technology, aiming […]
articles.title: Nexio Raises $2.2M in Pre-Seed Funding, Launches Parallelized Bitcoin Rollup to Revolutionize Bitcoin’s Scalability

Cryptoquant Analysis: Bitcoin Plummets Amid Bearish […]
articles.title: Cryptoquant Insights Warn: Bitcoin’s MVRV Ratio Signals Bearish Turn
